content: https //linktr ee/crochet_knit_tutorials halloween spider web decorations and spiders this spider web halloween decor can be used as a party decoration wall hanging decor or photo props in home and outdoor this crochet cobweb is designed to brighten up any wall door window or table this is cute and spooky decor makes a wonderful accent for a home or garden you can change dimension and colors add spiders long tails at the ends of the garland to be easily hung https //linktr ee/crochet_knit_tutorials - 1 - https //linktr ee/crochet_knit_tutorials skill level easy + materials stylecraft special dk yarn - 100% acrylic - 295m / 100g 322 yds you will need less than 1 ball black white red or any other color ★ 3 00 mm crochet hook should be taken number less than recommended for your yarn crochet should be tightly so that the decor was the form ★ stitch markers or pieces of yarn of a different color to mark the stitch ★ stuffing ★ needle ★ beads for eyes or plastic toy eyes you can make eyes out the yarn finished size 10/23/50/80 inches or 25/58/127/203cm in diameter gauge 22 stitches 30 row to 10 cm / 4 inch crochet terms american abbreviations ★ chain = chain ★ double_crochet = double_crochet ★ st s = stitch es ★ treble_crochet = treble_crochet ★ * or ** = repeat whatever follows the * or ** as indicated - 2 - https //linktr ee/crochet_knit_tutorials spider web chain 6 join with a slip st in first chain to form ring round 1 right side *chain 4 place marker pm chain 3 pm chain 4 slip st in ring repeat from * 5 times join with a slip st in first chain 6 large loops if you do not have stitch markers then you can use pieces of yarn of a different color to mark the stitch round 2 slip st in each chain to next marked chain *chain 5 pm chain 6 pm chain 5 slip st in next marked st chain 2 slip st in next marked st on next large loop repeat from * around round 3 slip st in each chain to next marked chain *chain 6 pm chain 10 pm chain 6 slip st in next marked st chain 5 slip st in next marked st on next large loop repeat from * around - 3 - https //linktr ee/crochet_knit_tutorials round 4 slip st in each chain to next marked chain *chain 7 pm chain 14 pm chain 7 slip st in next marked st chain 9 slip st in next marked st on next large loop repeat from * around for spiderweb 10 / 25 cm in diameter last round at the end of the previous round cut the thread and hide it inside take the thread and dial 6 chain leaving a long tail to attach the spider web slip st in the second marked st on the first loop 13 chain slip st in the
